transcript:
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir, good morning, kya haal chaal?
Executive: Badhiya, badhiya.
Customer: Ye kal ho gaya tha resolve ya kaise kya raha?
Executive: Account ki baat toh kiya tha maine.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Bole bhaiya maine toh aisa koi dala nahi tha inquiry, main bas puch raha tha unse IndiaMART wale se ki maal compound karna, bole unse kyun puch rahe sir mere se puchte.
Executive: Haan sahi baat hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh kya bole?
Executive: Bole nahi nahi aap boliye main unko phone kar deta hu dobara.
Customer: Unko boliye inform karein kyunki ye din badhta ja raha hai, kal mere paas mail aaya tha buyer supplier team ka.
Executive: Agar resolve nahi hua toh? Aage aage phone karwata hu rukiye. Reboot kar denge toh nuksan hoega na?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, aaj hi phone karwata hu. Mera ye service kitna din tak hai aur?
Executive: Abhi toh chal hi raha hai, ek second rukiye date bata deta hu.
Customer: Date bata dijiye usi hisab se plan kara jaye.
Executive: August 26 ka hai, extend karna hai kya maximizer?
Customer: Maximizer extend nahi karna hai, isme jaana hai.
Executive: Abhi nahi jaana hai, dekhiye abhi ab main bol dunga phir aap.
Customer: Woh toh aap bole the 8-10 din mein ho hi jayega.
Executive: Nahi wohi toh isliye main bolta nahi hu. Aap bol deta hu phir ek aisa rehta hai na aap log ka bhi phone aata hai phir kya hi bol paaye.
Customer: Matlab ye tha ki aapke product mein opportunity achi hai.
Executive: Ye matlab aisa nahi hai ki supplier nahi hai, buyer nahi hai, ache khase buyer flow hai team mein.
Customer: Dekhiye aap mere ko ek baat bataiye agar aapka business hota toh aap nahi chahte extend karne ka?
Executive: Sir bilkul sochta, kaun nahi chahta apna dhandha 40 lakh se 5 crore mein jaye.
Customer: Wahi wahi wahi, payment rehne chahiye aadmi kyun nahi rukega bataiye.
Executive: Turnover badhane ke liye hume invest toh karna hi padega. Abhi jo hamara peak time hai, ye jo hamara time hai na ye peak time hai.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Is time pe main kahin paisa idhar udhar karunga toh mere ko mushkil ho jayega.
Executive: Utna pura full amount le bhi nahi rahe the sir, part ka hi socha tha ki part mein ho jaye toh chota chota sa amount usme utna toh dekhiye priority mein.
Customer: Part mein hi toh part mein hi toh teen saal se ek saal mein aa gaya.
Executive: Haan toh ye woh toh chaliye woh toh due date se bahar chala gaya tha woh toh chalo aapka problem hi tha. Teen saal ka amount diya tha maine ek saal mein aa gaya teen saal se.
Customer: Haan haan woh toh convert ho gaya pro data basis pe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isme kya hai ki dekhiye do cheez hai yahan se aisa nahi hai ki paisa nahi niklega yahan se paisa achcha niklega star wale mein. Wahi paisa aap laga bhi sakte ho hai ki nahi?
Customer: Niklega.
Executive: Toh wahi na phir dekhiye priority kai cheezon ki hoti hai jaise aap laao aapke paas char kaam hai aap un charon mein se kisko pehle priority de rahe ho woh bhi matter karta hai na. Priority denge toh ho jayega nahi priority denge toh nahi hoega.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Is wajah se priority wali baat.
Customer: Nahi dekhiye main dekhta hu main batata hu abhi dekhiye final main bataunga nahi aapko.
Executive: Ji haan karenge.
Customer: Lekin main ye pehle dekhiye. 10 wala toh sasta hai 10 wala kar lijiye. All India mat kariye.
Customer: 10 wala jyada mahanga nahi padega chota chota category le lijiye.
Customer: Main aapko kya hi bolu main karunga main aapko deny nahi kar raha hu lekin thoda time dijiye mujhe.
Executive: Is month hai chance wance ya nahi hai?
Customer: Is month haan is month ho sakta hai koshish mein main bhi laga hua hu, theek hai, ho sakta hai.
Customer: Haan haan ho sakta hai.
Customer: Finally aap aap ye soch kar rahe ho 10 ka soch rahe ho all India soch rahe ho kis mein jyada clarity hai aapko?
Customer: All India soch raha hu all India, 10 ka nahi all India soch raha hu main.
Executive: Toh all India wale magar standard bhi aap loge toh ek category choti si aapan shayad premium team le rahe the na kaun si team le rahe the?
Executive: Choti category thi hamari standard wali premium team thi na ki Assam team thi?
Customer: Loose tea thi na.
Executive: Loose nahi tha loose toh premium category hai hamari standard mein baat hui thi main bata deta hu ek second rukiye.
Executive: Ye category chart.
Executive: Loose tea mahanga hai actually jahan tak mere known mein hai main list open kar raha hu.
Executive: Chaliye iske andar aap city toh jyada hai aapki 29 cities hai.
Executive: Aapki na? 29 mein aapne call kiya tha bhagya.
Executive: Ye loose tea premium hai main pehle hi bola tha 2 lakh ki bahut mahangi hai.
Executive: Aapka sasta kyun nahi yahi hai premium hai blended hai black tea hai tea dust ho gaya Darjeeling tea hai. Yahi 41 41 ki hai. Aap kisi din aapko phone karunga baat karunga.
Customer: Ye sab ek saal ka amount hai na?
Executive: Haan one year ka hai ek category chalega all India unlimited city. 10 mein agar aap jaate ho toh 66 66 ka pad jayega jaise premium blended black ke liye tea tea dust Darjeeling tea. Loose tea Assam tea CTC tea ye teeno premium category hai. Preferred star ke liye 2 lakh.
Executive: CTC tea ya CTC tea.
Executive: Haan ye teeno premium category hai. Preferred star ke liye 2 lakh plus GST aur star 10 ke liye 1 lakh plus GST ek category ka phir aapko usme category aur leni padegi phir woh aapka budget pahunchega dedh do lakh ke aas pass.
Executive: Toh 2 lakh ka mota mota hai premium category hai. Aapko leads matlab hai na by lead badha di aapko. Toh by lead badhane ke liye aapko sabse behtar tarika yahi hai ki aap standard mein bhi kar sakte ho. Standard do category aap le lijiye.
Customer: Chaliye dekhte hai batate hai abhi abhi toh koi fix nahi hai mera. Fir bhi main bataunga main aage se hi aapko call karunga.
Executive: Haan bhai koi dikkat nahi hai aap dekh lo arrange kar lo pehle aap isko resolve kara dijiye ye jo buyer supplier hai. Haan ye hatega tabhi ye ye hatega na tabhi hum utha bhi sakte hai nahi toh nahi utha sakte allotted rahi rehta buyer supplier koi bhi ticket hoti hai woh jab tak resolve nahi hoti. Chaliye main main main aaj hi karwata hu ruk jaiye.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants resolution for buyer supplier issue.

- Enquired about service duration and plan options.

- Inquiring about the amount of the plan.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve buyer supplier issue.

- Provided details on service duration and plan.

- Explained different plan categories and pricing.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call to resolve buyer issue.

- Customer will decide on plan later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, plan upgrade, resolution
